name: Lines of Code
how it works: It's the number of lines used to program a feature. Comments and empty lines are not accounted
interpretation: The lower the number the complexer it gets to understand the code

name: Feature Complexity
how it works: It is a number between 0 and 5 that express the complexity of the feature in terms of understandability
interpretation: The bigger the number the complexer it is to understand the feature
